name: Solana Development
description: Enhanced Solana development with MCP integration
rules: Always consider security implications when handling Solana accounts
Validate all account constraints in Anchor programs
Use appropriate account types (mut, signer) based on requirements
Implement proper error handling for all instructions
Follow Solana best practices for PDA derivation
Handle transaction confirmation properly in client code
Consider compute unit optimization for complex operations

customPrompts.anchor-program: When working with Anchor programs, always validate account constraints, implement proper error handling, and follow security best practices.
customPrompts.pda-derivation: For PDA derivation, ensure consistent seed usage, handle bump seeds properly, and validate PDA ownership.
customPrompts.client-integration: When building client applications, handle wallet connections gracefully, implement proper transaction confirmation, and provide clear user feedback.
customPrompts.testing: Write comprehensive tests covering all instruction paths, error conditions, and edge cases. Use proper test fixtures and mock data.
